item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

git — title: Week 1 homework author: ~ date: ‘2019-08-23’ slug: week-1-homework categories: [] tags: [] Assignment Write up a 1-page (or less) bulleted set of guidelines for best practices in reproducible research Write a paragraph describing the “Reinhart-Rogoff affair” and what it has to do with open science and reproducible data analysis. Install the following on your laptop: R Rstudio git Bash, if using Windows (see syllabus) Using the RStudio console (usually the lower-left hand window), calculate 2 + 2 Using the Bash console, having installed git, determine your version of the git software by typing git --version and pressing enter
